import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import VenuesEditForm from "../Venues/VenuesEditForm" import AudiencesEditForm from "../Audiences/AudiencesEditForm" /* Now using object destructuring to pull out the individual keys in the `props` object that gets passed to this component. https://tylermcginnis.com/videos/object-array-destructuring/ */ const DetailCard2 = ({gigs, venues, audiences, spots}) => { const {gigId, gigName, gigDate, gigResource, gigRating} = gigs const {venueId, venueName, venueResource, venueCity, venueState, venueCapacity} = venues const {audienceId, audienceName} = audiences const {spotId, spotName} = spots getGigs() getVenues() getAudiences() getSpots() return (
{name}

{addlInfo ? addlInfo : ""}

{ Details }
) } export default DetailCard2
